# tf.losses.get_regularization_losses

### `tf.losses.get_regularization_losses`

``` python
get_regularization_losses(scope=None)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py).

Gets the regularization losses.

#### Args:

* <b>`scope`</b>: An optional scope for filtering the losses to return.


#### Returns:

  A list of loss variables.
